title: Gold Claws Back Some Ground After Dramatic Unwinding of Rally
description: Gold rose, clawing back some losses after the abrupt unwinding of a record-breaking rally that had driven prices down 13% in just two days. Silver also advanced.
content: Gold rose, clawing back some losses after the abrupt unwinding of a record-breaking rally that had driven prices down 13% in just two days. Silver also advanced.
